body:
1. Add a patch for aarch64 platform.
It's confirmed by racon community with the issue:https://github.com/isovic/racon/issues/151

2. And new racon version with this code will make error:
`install_tree('spack-build/bin', prefix.bin)`
`install_tree('spack-build/lib', prefix.lib)`
I've tried all of the stable versions with this patch, they are work well.
title: racon: support aarch64 and fix install error
